name: Knight Side Scroller
description:
This is a personal project.

You control a knight. Defeat or dodge the ennemies in your way, triumph over the boss and free  the castle!

The game is short and only has one level so far, but it should be fully functionnal.

I am still unsure about the balance of the game, so do not hesitate to comment on your overall experience, what you felt was good or bad, or even suggest solutions. It would be higly appreciated.

I do not own any of the visual assets. I you have a complaint, please contact me.
